PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-07582010-06-14INDUSTRY,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActRadiocommunication Act
SubjectRadiocommunication Act (subsection 4(1) and paragraph 9(1)(b)) Exemption Order (Security, Safety and International Relations), No. 2010-3
PrecisRADIOCOMMUNICATION ACT (SUBSECTION 4(1) AND PARAGRAPH 9(1)(B)) EXEMPTION ORDER (SECURITY, SAFETY AND INTERNATIONAL RELATIONS), NO. 2010-3 - which exempts the RCMP from the application of this Act with respect to interfering with radiocommunication signals during and immediately preceding the G8 and G20 Summits in Huntsville and Toronto, Ontario for the period of June 21 to June 28, 2010.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0156 Publication Date: 2010-07-07
AttachmentsAttachment
